categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi

nodes.text: A Leader Named Leia is a young-readers World of Reading book that was released as part of Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi. It was written by Jennifer Heddle and published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on September 1, 2017.
To some she's a princess, to others a general, but to everyone Leia Organa is one of the galaxy's greatest leaders. Learn all about Leia's exciting adventures with A Leader Named Leia.
